type.name: document_property_assignment
type.description: This extends the assignment of properties to Document_definition.

entity.name: Document_content_property
entity.description:
A Document_content_property specifies characteristics describing the content of a Document_definition. At least one of the optional attributes shall be specified for each instance of this object.
In this case where a Document_content_property is referred by a Document_definition, the characteristics apply to all individual File objects.

explicit.name: detail_level
explicit.description: The detail_level specifies the level of detail that the Document_definition provides.

explicit.name: geometry_type
explicit.description: The geometry_type specifies the kind or kinds of geometry that an object contains.

explicit.name: real_world_scale
explicit.description: The real_world_scale specifies the scale that is used in the Document_definition the Document_content_property is referred by.

explicit.name: languages
explicit.description: The languages specifies which language or languages are used in the characterized objects. 'English' and 'Japanese' are examples for the fact that annotation on a drawing is provided in the language 'Japanese' or 'German' respectively.

explicit.name: described_element
explicit.description: The described_element is the Document definition representation to which the document content property is assigned.

entity.name: Document_creation_property
entity.description:
A Document_creation_property specifies characteristics describing the context of creation of a Document_definition.
In the case where a Document_creation_property is referred by a Document_definition, the characteristics apply to all individual File objects.

explicit.name: creating_system
explicit.description: The creating_system specifies the computer application or the machine which is used to create the object that is characterized.

explicit.name: creating_interface
explicit.description:
The creating_interface specifies the computer application used to create the Document_definition object.
'Postscript Printer Driver' is an example for a creating interface of a Physical_document.

explicit.name: operating_system
explicit.description: The operating_system specifies the operating system that is used to execute the computer application that created the characterized object.

explicit.name: described_element
explicit.description: The described_element is the Document definition representation to which the document creation property is assigned.

entity.name: Document_format_property
entity.description:
A Document_format_property specifies characteristics describing the format of a Document_definition. At least one of the optional attributes shall be specified for each instance of this object.
In the case where the Document_format_property is referred by a Document_definition, the characteristics apply to all individual File objects.

explicit.name: data_format
explicit.description: The data_format specifies the convention that was used to structure the information in the characterized object.

explicit.name: character_code
explicit.description: The character_code specifies the character code that is used in the characterized object.

explicit.name: size_format
explicit.description: The size_format specifies the dimensions of a physical presentation of the object the size_format is provided for. 'ISO A0' is an example for the size_format of a drawing that is stored digitally.

explicit.name: described_element
explicit.description: The described_element is the Document definition representation to which the document format property is assigned.

entity.name: Document_size_property
entity.description:
A Document_size_property specifies characteristics describing the size of a Document_definition. At least one of the optional attributes shall be specified for each instance of this object.
In the case where the Document_size_property is referred by a Document_definition, the characteristics apply to all individual File objects.

explicit.name: digital_file_size
explicit.description: The digital_file_size specifies the value that represents the size of a digitally stored document.

explicit.name: page_count
explicit.description: The page_count specifies the number of pages of a physical document.

explicit.name: described_element
explicit.description: The described_element is the Document definition representation to which the document size property is assigned.

entity.name: Document_source_property
entity.description: A Document_source_property specifies where a Document_definition can be found in a digital or physical data storage system.

explicit.name: path_information
explicit.description: The path_information is the name of the source by which it can be accessed in a physical or digital storage system. In a digital storage system, the path_information might describe the Internet node and the directory in which the file can be found.

explicit.name: storage_node
explicit.description: The storage_node provides a meaningful storage node location information of the Document representation. For a digital file, the storage_node is equivalent to the file name.

explicit.name: identifying_mechanism
explicit.description: The identifying_mechanism is used to specify the mechanism being applied to identify the storage item and the path information.

explicit.name: described_element
explicit.description: The described_element is the Document definition representation to which the document source property is assigned.
